data.text: Alatala fata wo rakiside,
kɔnɔ wo xa wali ɲaaxi nan wo makuyaxi wo Marigi Ala ra,
Wuli na wo bɛlɛxɛe ma, yunubi na wo ma.
Mixi yo mu birama kiiti tinxinxi fɔxɔ ra,
Wo luxi nɛ alɔ bɔximase xɛlɛ.
A gɛsɛ mu findima dugi ra.
E xulun fe ɲaaxi rabade,
E mu wama bɔɲɛsa xɔn ma,
Na nan a ra, won makuyaxi tinxinyi ra,
Won na won santide fenfe alɔ dɔnxui naxan ɲɛrɛma a yire masuxu ma.
Won xurundunma alɔ burun subee,
Muxu na na ki nɛ, barima muxu xa yunubie wuya,
Muxu bara i matandi, muxu bara i yanfa.
Muxu nun tinxinyi tagi ikuya.
Nɔndi to xɔnɔ, tinxintɔɛ nan tun tɔɔrɔma.
A a toxi nɛ mixi yo mu nimisaxi,
A xa tinxinyi luxi nɛ alɔ kanke makantase,
Ala kankan sare fima nɛ a xa wali ra,
Ibunadama gaaxuma nɛ Alatala xili ya ra,
«Xunsarama na fafe Siyon,
Alatala naxɛ, «N ma saatɛ nan ya e bɛ:
